items.content_html: RenderJS is a lightweight tool focusing on extending JavaScript native object prototypes, providing powerful DOM manipulation and data processing methods. It enhances development efficiency.
items.title: pardnchiu/RenderJS: RenderJS is a lightweight tool focusing on extending JavaScript native object prototypes, providing powerful DOM manipulation and data processing methods. It enhances development efficiency.

items.content_html: A lightweight library of Web Components
items.title: xujunhao940/DayUI: A lightweight library of Web Components

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension for mouse gestures, copy protection bypass, and quick search. Focused on essential features for optimal performance. (마우스 제스처, 복사 방지 해제, 빠른 검색 기능을 제공하는 가벼운 크롬 확장프로그램입니다. 핵심 기능에만 집중하여 최적의 성능을 제공합니다.)
items.title: purestory/tinymousegesture: A lightweight Chrome extension for mouse gestures, copy protection bypass, and quick search. Focused on essential features for optimal performance. (마우스 제스처, 복사 방지 해제, 빠른 검색 기능을 제공하는 가벼운 크롬 확장프로그램입니다. 핵심 기능에만 집중하여 최적의 성능을 제공합니다.)

items.content_html: A lightweight tool for testing and monitoring server actions in Next.js.
items.title: 1weiho/next-sandbox: A lightweight tool for testing and monitoring server actions in Next.js.

items.content_html: This project is a serverless, client-side application. It features a lightweight question-answering bot that runs entirely in the user's browser. The AI model is loaded after the initial page render and processes all queries locally using the client’s memory.
items.title: kuduwa-keshavram/serverless-ai-bot: This project is a serverless, client-side application. It features a lightweight question-answering bot that runs entirely in the user's browser. The AI model is loaded after the initial page render and processes all queries locally using the client’s memory.

items.content_html: QuickCart is a modern e-commerce platform built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, designed for a smooth and efficient shopping experience. It offers a lightweight, fast, and responsive interface, ensuring customers can browse and purchase products effortlessly.
items.title: thisistoomuchHarsh/QuickCart: QuickCart is a modern e-commerce platform built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, designed for a smooth and efficient shopping experience. It offers a lightweight, fast, and responsive interface, ensuring customers can browse and purchase products effortlessly.

items.content_html: serverless-pdf-generator is a lightweight package that simplifies the process of generating PDFs from web pages in a serverless environment like Vercel. It utilizes Puppeteer and Chromium to render pages and generate high-quality PDFs.
items.title: maheshpaulj/serverless-pdf-generator: serverless-pdf-generator is a lightweight package that simplifies the process of generating PDFs from web pages in a serverless environment like Vercel. It utilizes Puppeteer and Chromium to render pages and generate high-quality PDFs.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript dependency injection framework inspired by NestJS. Features decorator-based DI, routing, and modular architecture - perfect for learning how frameworks like NestJS work under the hood. 🐱
items.title: fernandohenriq/bananest: A lightweight TypeScript dependency injection framework inspired by NestJS. Features decorator-based DI, routing, and modular architecture - perfect for learning how frameworks like NestJS work under the hood. 🐱

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.
items.title: react18-tools/kosha: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.title: dashify-web/dashify: Dashify is a lightweight library for building customizable admin dashboards.

items.content_html: A lightweight offline-first synchronization library for React/Next.js applications, with built-in persistence and queue management.
items.title: caiotheodoro/syncflow: A lightweight offline-first synchronization library for React/Next.js applications, with built-in persistence and queue management.

items.title: jayyprajapati/code-collaboration-tool: A lightweight, browser-based code collaboration tool that allows multiple users to share their thoughts and build things together seamlessly.

items.content_html: BeeORM is a lightweight, TypeScript-based Object-Relational Mapper (ORM) designed for simplicity and flexibility, I built it as a side project, inspired by Java's JPA.
items.title: CoderAnchel/BeeORM: BeeORM is a lightweight, TypeScript-based Object-Relational Mapper (ORM) designed for simplicity and flexibility, I built it as a side project, inspired by Java's JPA.
